DOC.brief_title: Study Physical Health Women With Posttraumatic Stress Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete two study visit approximately 3-4 hour . The first study visit involve interview life experience emotion . If participant eligible second assessment , average length time visit 1 visit 2 1-7 day . The second visit include physical measurement cholesterol blood pressure , perform math speaking task , survey help u learn healthy behavior emotion . No follow-up participant conduct beyond two study visit .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Must able speak read English fluently Specific medication chronic disease History heart attack ( myocardial infarction ) Pregnant give birth last 3 month Perimenopausal postmenopausal
